1.content: what kind of giantess are you?
1.title: start the giantess story

14.content: Are you a real vocalist, or digital vocalist?
14.title: vocalist giantess

142.content:
Your name was li lu, a pop singer created digitally through a creator from a giantess named wang chi. You were technically a giantess too, but you could Shrink as well. You were famous at your home planet, but not other planets. Wang chi decided to take you for a live tour on live talking shows.

“But master, I’m kind of embarrassed by seeing new faces.” You said nervously.

“Don’t worry, once you’re at the live, it’s all up to you.” Wang chi replied.

You then went into portable screen device and you and your master went out. Your master wondered where your first live would be, and she decided to hit earth first. She called the embassy, and they said it was ok.

Your first destination was...
142.title: New digital pop idol!

1553.content:
Your name is Isabelle, a circus ring master who travel through the universe to put circus shows to everyone from young to old. You only did it for summer time as during the rest of the season, you let the workers rest and animals rest. But when the circus is near, you worked hard to let the workers and animals do their jobs done. As the summer draws near, you gathered your crew.

“Alright, our circus performance is near so I don’t want you all to give up! Is that clear!?” You shouted.

“Yeah!!” Crew shouted.

“Alright, our first stop is at the planet called earth. So get the posters put on their and get ready!!” You said.

“Yes, ma’am!” Crew shouted in cheer.

They then left for poster giving and training the animals. You wondered where in earth would you go? Few weeks passed and one of your crew came to you.

“Any sign on the posters?” You asked.

“We’ve got the business visas so we’re ok, ring master.” One crew said.

“Alright, where are we performing at?” You asked.

“We’re performing at...”
1553.title: Circus master is here!

1555.content: then how about these?
1555.title: Other

155551.content: what kind of kaiju do you want to be?
155551.title: kaiju giantess

info.description: this is a story inspired by giantess apprentice.
